Package jdbc

Class DataBaseUserController

java.lang.Object
jdbc.DataBaseUserController
public class DataBaseUserController extends Object
Controller to deal with user's details . Get from DB and Set to DB or update in DB user's details.

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      public static ServerMessage getUser(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      This method is used to get the user as User or RegisteredCustomer or Subscriber.
      Parameters:
      data - a Hashtable containing the following keys: "username", "password" and "isForRegistration"
      Returns:
      a ServerMessage object containing the user details if found, or an instruction indicating that the user was not found.

    • getSubscriber

      public static ServerMessage getSubscriber(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      This method is used to get the user as a subscriber.
      Parameters:
      data - a Hashtable containing the following keys: "username" and "isForRegistration"
      Returns:
      a ServerMessage object containing the subscriber details if found, or an instruction indicating that the subscriber was not found

    • getUserTypeDetails

      public static Hashtable<String,Object> getUserTypeDetails(String username, String password)
      This method is used to get the user as user or registered customer or subscriber details.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      a Hashtable containing the user details if found, or null if the user was not found

    • getUserDetalis

      public static User getUserDetalis(String username, String password)
      This method is used to get the general user details.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      password - the password of the user
      Returns:
      a User object containing the user details if found, or null if the user was not found

    • setuserDetailsAccordingToType

      private static User setuserDetailsAccordingToType(User generalUserdetails, User extraUserDetails, Role userRole)
      This method is used to set the user details according to the user type.
      Parameters:
      generalUserdetails - the general user details
      extraUserDetails - the extra user details for Subscriber or RegisteredCustomer.
      userRole - the role of the user, such as Subscriber or RegisteredCustomer.
      Returns:
      a User object with all the user details set according to the user type.

    • setUserLoggedIn

      public static ServerMessage setUserLoggedIn(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      This method is used to set the loggedIn attribute of a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      data - a Hashtable containing the user object and the loggedIn attribute.
      Returns:
      a ServerMessage indicating that the update is done.

    • getRegisteredCustomerDetalis

      private static RegisteredCustomer getRegisteredCustomerDetalis(String username)
      This method is used to get extra details about a user of type registered customer from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the registered customer.
      Returns:
      a RegisteredCustomer object containing the additional details, or null if the user is not found.

    • getSubscriberDetalis

      private static Subscriber getSubscriberDetalis(String username)
      This method is used to get extra details about a user of type subscriber from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the subscriber.
      Returns:
      a Subscriber object containing the additional details, or null if the user is not found.

    • getAllNotApprovedUsers

      public static ServerMessage getAllNotApprovedUsers(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      Parameters:
      data - hashtable that include the area that we want to seach the users that not approved in it.
      Returns:
      array of relevant users

    • updateUserStatus

      public static ServerMessage updateUserStatus(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      This method is used to update users's status.
      Parameters:
      data - a hashtable that include arraylist with usersname of users that the Area Manager Confirm
      Returns:
      ServerMessage

    • getSubscriberUserName

      public static ServerMessage getSubscriberUserName()
      This method is used to get all the usernames of the subscribers. this function goes over subscribers and return their userName
      Returns:
      the names of all the subscribers we have in array

    • getSubscriberNumber

      public static ServerMessage getSubscriberNumber(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      This method gets the maximum subscriber number from the subscriber table in the database.
      Parameters:
      data - a hashtable containing the data to be used in the method
      Returns:
      ServerMessage containing the maximum subscriber number in the subscriber table.

    • updateRegisteredCustomerAfterRegistration

      public static ServerMessage updateRegisteredCustomerAfterRegistration(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      This method updates the details of a registered customer in the database. It updates the user's row in the user's table and also updates or adds a new row in the registered customer's table.
      Parameters:
      data - A Hashtable containing the updated user details in the form of a RegisteredCustomer object.
      Returns:
      A ServerMessage object indicating the success of the update operation.

    • updateSubscriberAfterRegistration

      public static ServerMessage updateSubscriberAfterRegistration(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      This method updates subscriber's details in the database after a registration process. The method receives a Hashtable that contains the updated subscriber details. The method update the subscriber's details in the subscriber's table in the database.
      Parameters:
      data - A Hashtable that contains the updated subscriber details.
      Returns:
      ServerMessage.

    • getWorkerPermissions

      public static Hashtable<String,Object> getWorkerPermissions(User worker)
      This method is used to get worker's permissions. It takes a user object as input and returns a Hashtable containing the user object and the second role of this worker.
      Parameters:
      worker - User object containing the worker's details.
      Returns:
      Hashtable String, Object containing the user object and second role of the worker.

    • getUserDetailsForSendEmailAndSMS

      public static ServerMessage getUserDetailsForSendEmailAndSMS(Hashtable<String,Object> data)
      This method is used to retrieve the contact information (username, first name, last name, email, and telephone) of a user from the database. The information is used to send email and SMS to the user(pop up window message).
      Parameters:
      data - a Hashtable containing the username of the user in the key userForEmailAndSMS.
      Returns:
      a ServerMessage object containing the user's contact information in the key "userForSendEmailAndSMS", or null if the user is not found.

    • importData

      public static boolean importData()
      This function will happen when their is click on "Import Data" in the server screen This method will put data of users from locl csv file to the DB
      Returns:
      true if the importData success. Otherwise, false.

    • extracted

      private static void extracted(Statement stmt, String fileName, String tableName) throws SQLException
      Parameters:
      stmt -
      fileName -
      tableName - This method get data from fileName and put it in the table (=tableName) in our DB.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • resetsDebtAmount

      public static void resetsDebtAmount()
      This method set the debt amount of subscribers to 0 in the end of the month

    • countDebtAmount

      private static int countDebtAmount()
      Returns:
      the number of subscriber that need to reset to them the debtAmount
